amendment.description: To require disclosure of political intelligence activities under Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995.

action.text: Amendment SA 1493 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 1470.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1493, under the order of 2/2/2012, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 12.
